job.title: Lead Software Engineer

reviews and testing You willpphelp set and maintain code standards as well as ensure the team follows best testdriven development practicesppbrpulli2 years of experience developing launching and evolving scalable web applicationsliliExperience with strongemReact Nativeemstrong strongemJavaemstrongliliExperience with multiple fullstack web frameworksliliExperience building APIs for internal and publicfacing use casesliliAn expert command of HTML and ability to write modular and responsive CSSliulpbrppPreferredpulliBS BA or MS Computer Science or related fieldliliExperience with Agile andor Scrum development methodologiesliliContribution to open source projectsliulpbrppWe are looking for a Lead Software Developer to join our clients team based in Vancouver WA Our client is the first online network for builders and remodelers to connect with subcontractors and tradespeople in real time and has recently raised 25 million in venture capital The company is highly recognized in the tech community for their innovations in the construction industryppbrppIn this role you will lead a small team of developers in building an enterprise level web application as well as furthering the development of an existing mobile app You will take a pivotal role in decision making by providing expertise on the selection and development of architecture for their new web platformnbspppbrppstrongAbout the CompanystrongppbrppThe company is the first marketplace for builders and remodelers and is a wellknown player in the construction tech community Their 1 goal is to build the best construction labor procurement solution period Through close ties with the customers and industry vendors they are able to gather feedback and implement substantive innovative changes to their software in ways that outshine anyone else in the industry The company has users nationwide and plans to expand to new locations in 2021 The organization was founded in 2019 and has around 25 employees In May 2021 the company raised 25 million in a Series Seed 2 roundppbrppstrongspan classqlcursorspanKey ResponsibilitiesstrongpulliArchitect implement and launch elegant and maintainable applications and systemsliliWork closely with the Customer Success Business and QA team to craft scope and implement new featuresliliAdopt and promote bestpractices and technology for performance usability and testabilityliliImplement features and perform audits of existing features to meet Web Content Accessibility Guidelines WCAGliliWear multiple hats We are a relatively small organization and it is vital that everyone is prepared to do things that may not be a part of their regular workflowliliWork closely with and help organize offshore and remote developersliliLead daily standups and participate in sprint planningliliDesign and implement dev ops processespipelinesliulpbrppstrongApplication StackstrongpullistrongemJava APIemstronglilistrongemReact Native iOS and Android mobile
